fields.name: Headline
fields.default: I've spoken at events all around the world and been interviewed for many podcasts.

fields.name: Subheadline
fields.default: One of my favorite ways to share my ideas is live on stage, where there's so much more communication bandwidth than there is in writing, and I love podcast interviews because they give me the opportunity to answer questions instead of just present my opinions.

appearances.description: A technical deep-dive into HelioStream, the real-time streaming library I wrote for transmitting live video back to Earth.

appearances.title: Lessons learned from our first product recall
appearances.description: They say that if you're not embarrassed by your first version, you're doing it wrong. Well when you're selling DIY space shuttle kits it turns out it's a bit more complicated.

appearances.title: Using design as a competitive advantage
appearances.description: How we used world-class visual design to attract a great team, win over customers, and get more press for Planetaria.

appearances.title: Bootstrapping an aerospace company to $17M ARR
appearances.description: The story of how we built one of the most promising space startups in the world without taking any capital from investors.

appearances.title: Programming your company operating system
appearances.description: On the importance of creating systems and processes for running your business so that everyone on the team knows how to make the right decision no matter the situation.
